website_summaries.verdict: The slightly smaller size and closed design make this a good choice for newborns, fussy babies, or tight spaces.
pros: Plush padding and a cocoon-like shape provide an added sense of security
Antimicrobial outer cover is stain and water-resistant
Slightly smaller dimensions fit most framed changing tables
Non-skid bottom helps keep it in place
cons: Taller babies may quickly outgrow four-sided changing pads
Non-skid base could be more effective

customer_reviews.title: I love the 4 sided over the 3 sided ones because ...
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 2 of these now. I love the 4 sided over the 3 sided ones because I don't change a wiggly kid standing at his feet. we place it on top of the dresser and not in a framed changing table so the 4 sides is perfect. I like that it is small so it doesn't take up a ton of space, but it is still large enough to fit my 2 year old for changes. this pad withstood 2 kids and only gave out because my 2 year old pulled it down during naptime and ripped and pulled out the stuffing. Apparently his toys weren't interesting enough. Baby #3 got a replacement of the exact same one.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: I love that there are two little straps in the back ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I'm using a regular dresser as a changing table so there's no frame to surround the changing pad. I love that there are two little straps in the back so I can attach it to the back of the dresser and it won't slide around. The non-slip pad on the bottom does a good job of keeping it in place too!
customer_reviews.author: Summer Goddard

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: This changing pad is our little guy's favorite spot...from birth and still now at 3.5 months. He feels so secure because it has 4 sides, and it's so easy to clean. We use the Burt's Bees changing pad sheets (which fit great), as well as a liner on top so we don't have to change the sheets often at all. Highly recommend! No sketchy smells and holds up well!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: I love the shape of this
customer_reviews.text: I love the shape of this. I also love that it was able to fit on top of the dresser.
customer_reviews.author: loveamazon123

customer_reviews.title: works as expected
customer_reviews.text: This does what it is supposed to. It is hard to find a good cover for it. The bottom is just cardboard, so over time I could see it bending and wearing down (especially if there was a spill that went under the changing pad). I think they could make this better by having a better bottom with a skid pad so it doesn't slip around (this moves around a LOT, unless you adhere it to the table). I like it, and right now it is in our living room since we have an infant.. but I don't LOVE the product and think maybe i could have just purchased cheaper product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for our nursery. We do almost every single diaper change on it! It’s almost perfect, but is starting to get a few cracks in the plastic/waterproof coating (it’s been used for 7 months). We put a sheet over it, anyway, so it isn’t a big deal. We will buy another for our next baby. Awesome for the price. It doesn’t super grip the surface it is on, but does come with safety straps to drill into the back of the dresser or changing table. We never used that feature and never had any issues; although, we do not leave our baby unattended.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S Delgaudio

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Quality
customer_reviews.text: It's the perfect size and i really like the shape. However, it's cheaply made. The cover is rough, not soft at all. I could tell from the moment i touched it that it won't last alot of wear & tear. If anything it's overpriced for the quality. We will be keeping it because we decided to open it up, add extra cushion for softness and comfort for baby. We're also going to order a very soft velour like cover to make it comfortable and look better in general. As is though wouldn't cut it for me. I'd give it a 2 to 3 stars but Quality is the biggest downside to this pad.
customer_reviews.author: Nelly

customer_reviews.title: Great overall purchase
customer_reviews.text: My baby LOVES this as much as I do! We initially bought this for a changing table my husband was building at the time, and she absolutely loves being in it while getting changed! It is very soft and the sides keep her from rolling out of it! Sometimes she will be fussy when she mess to be changed but will quiet down once in it! For messes: All I need to do is wipe up the mess and it is gone! It still has its white color and it going strongly, with my baby being 4 months now!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: wife loves it, and so does baby!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and soft little mattress- our little man feels pretty secure and usually calms down once he is placed on it. I have only had to clean it once, and it was super easy to do. I did buy a plastic cover to make the clean up somewhat faster. The straps definitely help to make us feel better about changing him and grabbing stuff from under the table etc. baby approved
customer_reviews.author: Edgar

customer_reviews.title: Be ready to have to replace or return
customer_reviews.text: I plan to re order only bc it's the only pad that fits my convertible crib changing table BUT really wish I had other options!! First of all I was sent a plastic wrapped USED changing pad with stains on the back and a HORRIBLE smell almost like rotten milk. Also the label is super faded and shows feb as the delivery date 🙄 I understand things happen but wow!!
customer_reviews.author: NANi

customer_reviews.title: Easy mobile changing table, decent quality
customer_reviews.text: I love that it is easy to clean which is needed for pee and blow outs and can be placed anywhere, creating a mobile changing table. Unfortunately the seams ripped under two weeks of purchase, causing water to enter the back when rinsing it. It’s made of cardboard, so it’s now damaged. They are sending me a replacement, hopefully this one last longer! I also do wish it had a dip so pee can fall towards it rather than spread as it’s a flat surface.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: A nice place to clean BMs
customer_reviews.text: Our newborn really seems to enjoy himself every time he nestles in for a diaper change. He might even like it too much as he shat 5 times last night, likely just for a chance to use it. Shart juice wipes right off without staining, so you don’t have to worry about making a mess during changes in the dark when you’re half asleep. My wife usually asks what the hell happened when she sees streaks the next day, but at least I don’t have to clean it. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Lang

customer_reviews.title: Great pad - but received the wrong one.
customer_reviews.text: Side bumpers are great for squirmy babies. I bought it to attach to an Ikea cubby system so the nail straps were super important and work great. I ordered the one with four bumper walls and received the one with the sidewalls, but I am still happy with the purchase even if the side one was a few bucks cheaper. Bought some universal changing pad coves and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Nice shape and Good price
customer_reviews.text: We had bought a changing pad for the changing table for when my grandson visits but it was not high enough to prevent him from banging his head on the table surrounds so I ordered this one. We have used the ties to add it on top of the original pad and made it secure and it works well. Nice design with the contoured shape and even when he squirms and wriggles it works well to prevent him from bumping his head on the table
customer_reviews.author: Jean A Marwick

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it, so do I
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't find a cover for this one but i didnt try to hard. My baby loveeessss the crunchy sound it makes when he kicks so he goes crazy kicking up a storm.. we've had many peepees on this thing and its really easy to clean. The only thing is you'll have a little pool of pee
customer_reviews.author: Angela Escobar

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Love this changing table mattress!! The non skid bottom really does work!! We used an old dresser for our changing table so it didn’t have “sides” that keep the mattress in place, the non skid bottom really keeps it in place though. My son can wiggle around and it doesn’t budge. Easy to clean, and regular changing pad covers fit it! Will definitely use for our next baby as well
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee B

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: About year old and it is developing holes in the plastic cover. The shape also contributes to it wearing out quickly, the contour started collapsing after only a few weeks of use. Definitely not worth buying since it wears out so fast. Another issue is it is smaller then most other changing pads so it does not fit well in the changing table.
customer_reviews.author: hexen

customer_reviews.title: Feels cheap
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't seem to be the best quality. There are parts where the little seams look like they're about to rip out and I'm worried it won't hold up for long. I do like the taller sides to help keep baby put.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonaddictTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had one of these for a while and just bought a second one for the 2nd floor. Very durable and easy to wash. It’s a plastic fabric so not soft per se, but our baby doesn’t seem to mind. We used to put liners on but those were actually harder to clean so now we don’t and just rinse this down in the shower if there’s an accident.
customer_reviews.author: Kira Schabram

customer_reviews.title: garbage
customer_reviews.text: The negative reviews are not lying. This thing is falling apart at the seams and I haven’t even had it a month. My baby has used it twice. Awful. The whole thing is coming apart. Go with the *opposite of winter* brand contour pad. That one lasted me two years and I only tossed it bc I didn’t think I’d need it for my second kid
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Great for on top of a dresser
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had it for one day but already love it. We currently us Brolex changing pad covers and they fit great even though this shape is a little odd. My wife loves that it’s rounded because we use this on a dresser and have the two small mounting screws drilled in the back. If we start having any issues I will update. If nothing changes, then I love this buy.
customer_reviews.author: adaley4

customer_reviews.title: Safety hazard!
customer_reviews.text: We literally just put this on our little one's dresser and went to snap the snap. Imagine our shock when the stitching on the underside of the pad came undone! This is the part of the pad that is suppose to keep your little one safe and secure on the pad should they wriggle or roll, but it's falling apart. One-star review since this device is a safety hazard for babies. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Davis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Wiggles
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! Put this on my crib side changing table; HUGE improvement over the flat little pad that was there before! Fits almost any changing pad I purchased and comfortable enough for my baby to keep sleeping while I change her. The design keeps her right in the middle as she tries to roll around and the strap ensures she won’t go anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: MargaritaMomDays

customer_reviews.title: Not non-skid, but nice
customer_reviews.text: This changing pad is a nice size for the top of our changing table/dresser combo. I'm docking a star because the description says the bottom is non-slip but it definitely is not, and I'm not going to screw it into my solid wood dresser. I'll just have to find a different way to secure it.
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: This little changing pad is great. It cleans up well. I never did use the safety strap because, well, it's kind of in the way. We had this on top of a changing table and it made me too nervous to have up so high. Looking back, I'd probably be better off with a receiving blanket on the bed.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: Really like this changing pad, especially that it has 4 sides. Only complaint I have is that the bottom is made of slippery fabric, and the only way to secure pad is to nail into changing table/dresser top. Simple solution is to attach rubber drawer/shelving liner. Still, for the cost, this changing pad is definitely worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Wendi

customer_reviews.title: Fits IKEA changing table
customer_reviews.text: I needed a changing pad that fit my IKEA changing table (which does not fit other standard changing pads which are usually an inch or two longer than this one). This fits perfectly and works just fine. It's also easy to wipe off for those spills that get past the waterproof liner/changing pad cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good choice :)
customer_reviews.text: So far we love it. Yes it could be hard to clean if you let the mess dry up since there is stitching for the design pattern, but we clean it up asap to avoid that. Good size. Nice quality. Has 2 straps on back to attach it to a dresser or changing table.
customer_reviews.author: jbfl11

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was having a hard time finding a 30" changing pad to fit in the ikea gulliver changing table. Everything I found was more expensive than the table itself which defeated the purpose of saving $$ by going with ikea. This fits perfect length wise and is a little short width wise but for the price, it will serve its purpose perfectly! No funky plastic smell and while I haven't used it yet, I would definitely recommend it if you are looking for a pad that fits the gulliver table
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Sleep glorious sleep
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this, we use it as the mattress in her bassinet, she is 8 weeks old and sleeps all night long, it’s an amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary/Barb

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I needed an oddly proportioned changing pad and this one is absolutely perfect. Not only is it plushy enough but also durable, it’s super easy to wipe down too. I do love that it’s raised on all sides too.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Wieland

customer_reviews.title: Fits the Gulliver Ikea Changing Table
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I purchased the "Gulliver" Ikea changing table for our bedroom to have downstairs to make changing easier with a newborn while he is sleeping in our room. The standard sized changing pad/mat we purchased at Buy Buy Baby for the nursery upstairs was about 2 inches too wide for the odd Ikea table size. This pad fits great with about a little extra room to spare on both the length and width. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Jarod Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Cracking After A Few Months
customer_reviews.text: After only five months of normal usage, it started cracking badly.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Nice and big changing table
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this product because I’m pregnant but I did open this changing pad and I think it’s nice and big. Many different covers even for the square style still fit .. but the plastic is my only conern... it seems like it’s going to rip after cleaning a couple times... i will update my review when my boy uses it let’s see !
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Fits smaller changing tables
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for almost 4 months now and it fits perfectly on our changing table. We have one with a tower so we needed a smaller pad because the standard size doesn't fit. It was either this one or the bumbo changing pad but it cost too much. This pad was a better value and our baby actually enjoys lying down on it! Also, a standard size cover fits this pad.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia B.

customer_reviews.title: Must-have changing table topper
customer_reviews.text: What’s not to like about this lightweight, portable, functional and durable changing table topper? Forget spending a lot for similar items. You can cover this with a sheet but it’s totally unnecessary. The vinyl makes wiping away unsavory fluids and solids easy with no lingering smell. It’s just deep enough that baby won’t roll out but not too deep to make accessing the baby hard. Baby will be secure and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice Onwuka

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I chose this changing mat because it is smaller than the others. Our dresser in the nursery is a fairly small piece and most mats would have not fit. This one fits great and was easy to secure in place. Seems to be quality made as well.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Schmiedl

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice I’m happy with this so far. Easy to wipe off and it’s a nice size. It did smell a little when I got it but it’s plastic so I let it air out over night it was fine the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Best changing pad
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. The shape is great to keep baby from rolling and the buckle keep her secure and safe. I’ve even used it as a portable lounger when we took a trip and it worked great with a soft cover over it.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grand baby . It has held up well . Easy to clean .
customer_reviews.author: rcreese

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I love the raised edges all the way around. The pattern is pretty unnecessary and seems like it'd be hard to clean poop out of the tiny holes if it ever got there. But I use underpads from SAMs club (bed liners made for bed wetting) that cover the whole thing so I don't have to worry about that.
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well. Has straps toward the back to be secured to a charging table or dresser. Really like the safety strap. Nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony A.

customer_reviews.title: Bottom NOT skid proof as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product due to the fact that it is not skid proof like the description states. I have to hold the pad in place with my elbow as i change my newborn. Which you can imagine how difficult that is while trying to change a squirmy baby!! I was hoping to not have to buy a topper as well but now i have to as baby is already here and i need a spot to change him on. That will hopefully arrive this week. Otherwise the mat itself is well made and without a cover on it, its easily wiped clean.
customer_reviews.author: julissa adame

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Grandbabies
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to have out our house for our grandbabies. It is light weight, durable and easily wiped down. It’s actually our 6 week old grandson’s favorite place to lay. Our daughter said she wishes she had the same one. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: I’m so happy this pad fits
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy this pad fits!! I bought the sundvik changing table from ikea unbeknownst that regular changing pads won’t fit and I didn’t like the look of theirs. This one fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I haven't used it yet...
customer_reviews.text: This arrived today and I haven't used it yet, but wanted to post a review. A couple other reviewers commented on the non-slip/non-skid bottom being great. Well... They must have reviewed the wrong item, because this is NOT non-slip at all. I bought it to place on the vanity in our master bathroom, and will need to be careful so it doesn't slide (can't secure it to the vanity top, so was really counting on the non-slip). Other than that, this seems nice for the price, I am happy with the 4 sides (another big factor in choosing this changing pad) and happy with the size as we needed a slightly shorter pad.
customer_reviews.author: Rumi

customer_reviews.title: Great for a wiggly baby
customer_reviews.text: I love that this changing pad has ridges on all 4 sides! My daughter is very wiggly, but she can't roll out of this and that puts me at ease. It also has a clip that I strap her in with if I need to step away for a moment. Essentially, everything that I need to feel secure as a new mom. Highly recommend this changing pad.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Changing pad
customer_reviews.text: Recommended- you can see my other purchase of the cover which fits well. Not perfect fit but well enough to buy a second cover
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: so the 16 x 30 measurement was perfect for it
customer_reviews.text: I just received this and set it up on my dresser! I have a smaller dresser top, so the 16 x 30 measurement was perfect for it!! The cushion is nice, and it has a rose design on it. Even though I am covering it with a changing pad, I thought it was cute. I also love that all four sides are raised. Altogether, I really like it!
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: Works with standard contoured covers
customer_reviews.text: We needed a changing pad a little smaller than the normal changing pad to use on top of the dresser we were using as a changing area. I was concerned that it would be difficult to find covers for this pad given that all four sides are contoured instead of just two, but I trusted the other reviews that the covers for the 2-sided contour covers worked on this. It's not a perfect fit (the covers don't lay flat when it's just sitting there) but it absolutely works. I like that it is contoured on all sides - not that I'm ever wandering away from the baby on the changing table but there is an added sense of security.
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: Coming apart at the seams
customer_reviews.text: After using this for a year, one of the seams is coming apart and it is cracking along the edges. The cocoon style is also not useful once baby is bigger. It's hard to fit a 1 year old on this mat.
customer_reviews.author: C. Finke

customer_reviews.title: Fits Sorelle Berkley Crib's changing table
customer_reviews.text: This is just to review the fit, haven't used it yet. The Sorelle Berkley Crib with changing table has a changing table slot of 16x28 inches. This one needs to be mushed in a bit but does successfully fit.
customer_reviews.author: snalla

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for its purpose. Durable and soft with rounded corners. Great design and easy to clean. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than standard
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be smaller than a standard size. There is a lot of extra fabric bunching up with the changing pad cover. It’s also barely long enough to hold my 4 month old baby. This would be best for someone with a small space and a short baby. Wouldn’t work for a baby much past 24 inches long. Otherwise it is comfy and functional.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Supper cute changing pad
customer_reviews.text: I love the shape of this changing pad. I hate the triangle shape of the original ones. This one gives a more cute look to your nursery.
customer_reviews.author: Gema A.

customer_reviews.title: Anti-Slip doesn’t work well, but cocoon part is great!
customer_reviews.text: Love the cocoon part of this! I do wish the anti-slip part worked better! It moves around a lot on our bureau.
customer_reviews.author: The Romance Bookie

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces or travel!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great for travel (camping etc) or those spots like grandparents houses where they might not need a full changing table or have the room for one. My little one relaxes in it nicely and it cleans well.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great changing pad! I love the cocoon style and edges all around. I purchased a standard changing table sheet from target and it fits it perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amber T.

customer_reviews.title: Fits into attached crib changing tables
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly in our crib attached changing table. Wanting something thicker than the standard pad sold with the crib to protect her head, arms, and legs from hitting the wooden bars and this did the trick. Is much safer and comfier for her and all our covers etc fit no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Working Supermom

customer_reviews.title: I like the way all four sides are raised so it ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent product. I like the way all four sides are raised so it cradles the baby and makes it difficult for her to roll out. The plastic covering doesn't really have any creases, I like this because it makes it easier to wipe clean. I also like the material that lines the underside of the pad as it adds friction to help keep it from sliding around the changing table as the baby moves. I gave this product four stars because I felt that is was a little overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Must-have changing pad
customer_reviews.text: I love this changing pad. I had one for the first baby and just bought a second one for my second so I have one both upstairs and downstairs. The curved sides are a must-have to make sure your tiny one doesn't roll off the changing pad. The first one is still in great shape and there are not rips, cracks, or issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi D

customer_reviews.title: Not slip resistant
customer_reviews.text: Product is not slip resistant it has a super slippery base. Unless you are wanting to screw this to your dresser or table top. Avoid
customer_reviews.author: TheAudionElectricalGuru

customer_reviews.title: Great Pad!
customer_reviews.text: I Love this Pad! It was hard to find a small pad to fit our crib/changer combo. This is such a delight. My daughter loves being on this pad. We have spent playtime on this pad she loves it so much and because she has acid reflux so bad we were even able to use it to help her sleep in her bassinet. I have bought two of these pads. One for upstairs and one for downstairs and thinking about buying a third for the convenience of having another. I also love it because the sides come up on all four sides, not just two like most pads! It's waterproof and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: B Family

customer_reviews.title: nice changing pad
customer_reviews.text: Item as described. Nice changing pad. Attaches to dresser/table for added safety. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: nkchristine

customer_reviews.title: But this pad fits just perfect, leaving a little bit of room
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Ikea changing table perfectly. Just FYI, Ikea tables are a tad bit smaller than regular baby store ones, about 1 inch, so a regular changing pad has to be squeezed into the Ikea changing table. But this pad fits just perfect, leaving a little bit of room, but I have my diaper rash cream and Vaseline sitting right there in the little space.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Best one yet!
customer_reviews.text: Best one by far; I've tried the summer conture (popular in babys r us I believe) one and it didn't last more than a couple of months before it had tears, and since my 6 month old baby has her accidents every now and then, I needed something that would feel soft, but tough, and this one fits the bill. So far so good, it's been a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla M.

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Very useful, effective for diaper changes, appreciate that it’s waterproof. Seems durable and good quality, hopefully long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: like I had to do using the bassinet option
customer_reviews.text: This baby pad fits right on top of the dresser in my granddaughter's room and I don't have to bend down to change her, like I had to do using the bassinet option. It secures easily using two screws at the back of the dresser and the plastic cover allows quick cleanup if anything leaks out during the change. I didn't buy a separate cover-really isn't necessary and cleanup is much quicker. Don't need to add to the laundry pile after messy changes - just wipe clean.
customer_reviews.author: User1

customer_reviews.title: Great size and quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the size . Not too big and leaves some space on the dresser top. Nice and padded too.
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnna Kisling

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised and a perfect fit for smaller changing tables (Like the Hemnes table from IKEA)
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly as advertised, and if you have a smaller changing table that needs a smaller pad, it's perfect. It is an almost exact fit for the Hemnes changing table that is sold at IKEA (it's a short chest of drawers and then you add a table to the top to make it into a changing table) and it winds up being perfect- you can store your wipes, diapers, etc alongside the pad and have everything within an easy reach. Never have to turn your back on the baby!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Cox

customer_reviews.title: Quality buy
customer_reviews.text: Good product. It’s waterproof and you can hear that when the baby lays on it, even With a cover over. I bought because it can attach under the dresser and won’t slide off. I also like how it’s shaped.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanna

customer_reviews.title: Very nice changing pad
customer_reviews.text: Very nice changing pad. This is exactly what I was looking for. The cover is made of a material that is easily cleaned by wiping it off, which makes it super easy for mom's to clean up and begin using again after little accidents. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Nice 360’ padding
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to fit in the top of a rolling 3 drawer tool cart to use as garage/racing themed changing table. Couldn’t ask for a more functional table & 360’ of raised padding was perfect protection from table edges. Regular changing pad covers fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Diamond H Ranch

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly thought it was going to be a little smaller but thats ok. I wanted to put his diapers, wipes & diaper cream next to the changing mat but it’s ok. I’ll figure something out 😊.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Shinawatra

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart in just 2 months
customer_reviews.text: We've only been using this for 2 months and one of the corners is completely split down the seam with the stuffing coming out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: 100% would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm! 100% water proof. It’s really soft under the water proof material and the raised sides help my 3 month old from rolling out while I’m changing him.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: One of the two I purchased got a hole in it after 9 months of gently use. Otherwise we liked them.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Jameson

customer_reviews.title: I use it all the time
customer_reviews.text: We didn't want to buy a changing table so we bought this instead after seeing the idea on Pinterest. It fits perfectly on top of our baby's Hemnes drawer.
customer_reviews.author: K.A.

customer_reviews.title: Works fine with the "Athena Daphne Convertible Crib and Changer"!!
customer_reviews.text: Great changing pad, love it. We're using it with the "Athena Daphne Convertible Crib and Changer" and it fits fine for us. The dimensions of the changing pad space is 15.5 x 27.5 x 1 inches. With a little bend on one side, it sits in allowing me to get the job done hahaha.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Almonte

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly shaped
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It fits our changing table perfectly and is nicely grooved to keep baby in the center...although after 4 months of age you'll be lucky to keep your baby from trying to flip over on the changing table. Easy to clean and nice firm material. If you're looking for some advice on other baby registry essentials, check out AllMomsArePerfect dot com. You'll get the lowdown on what you really need and what you could save to buy later or avoid completely.
customer_reviews.author: PuddlethePoodle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Changing Pad
customer_reviews.text: Well made and the perfect size for changing table. The design is perfect because it surrounds baby is softness and comfort. It also has a safety strap and is well padded. Also, the price was much better on Amazon than in the big baby stores, and I got free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: ikc8460

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for on top of dresser
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for on top of dresser. Love that the lip goes all the way around it. Strap snaps easily and adjusts well.
customer_reviews.author: SweetCaliJules

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Fits great on changing table topper leaving space for diapers wipes and cream. Soft, durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: It fits perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love this changing pad!! I have been looking for a long time for a changing pad that fits our crib/changing table combo and everything I’ve found doesn’t fit. This is prefect! Also, the multiple curved sides are a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Megan hooper

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully thick and well cushioned
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfully thick and well cushioned. I bought it to fit in our crib's changing table areawhich is 30" deep, and it fits (albeit quite snugly). Love the contour on this pad!
customer_reviews.author: Paula F.

customer_reviews.title: 4-sided is great
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is 4-sided because I don't have to worry about the baby's head hitting at the top of the changing table where most pads have a low side. Quality of the pad seems so-so- the plastic is kind of crunchy. The first time we were sent the wrong product (2-sided) but after initiating the return we got the correct product.
customer_reviews.author: nycmama

customer_reviews.title: Does not have a non-skid bottom
customer_reviews.text: Not overly padded. Bottom feels like it is made of cardboard. Seems to be low quality. Absolutely does not have a non-skid bottom like proposed. We purchased this particular changing pad because we wanted a non-skid bottom to set on top of a dresser.
customer_reviews.author: Fishmaniam

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Just got this so really can’t comment on durability but all features seem fine. Seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: MSS

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly onto the Ikea Malm dresser which is slightly ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly onto the Ikea Malm dresser which is slightly too narrow for most changing pads. The downside is that baby grew too long within a year - but that's not the changing pad's fault!! Now I just change him on the bed, floor or anywhere else that he can't injure himself as the dresser would be too dangerous now that he can move around! I found it difficult to figure out which cover would fit it before purchasing, but this cover fits perfectly:
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like how this cradles the baby in all directions. It is durable and fits most covers. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Elle_C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for nursery
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite changing pad. Purchased a few others and returned them. Love how the mattress comes up on the sides and isn’t flat.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Love the size!
customer_reviews.text: I love this changing pad! It is a bit smaller than most changing pads and it fits perfectly on the dresser I turned into a changing table. I didn't want a huge bulky pad and this is perfect. My baby has plenty of room on it and it has 4 sides and a strap, which makes me feel better. I have a cover on mine, but I have used it without the cover and my baby doesn't mind laying on the "plastic". It wipes clean really easily. You won't regret buying this!
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Great changing pad
customer_reviews.text: I thought I could get away without a proper changing pad and I was wrong. I’m so glad I bought this. It fits perfectly on a smaller dresser and when I put my baby in there, he’s cocooned so well. Easy to clean as well
customer_reviews.author: lilengine87

customer_reviews.title: NOT SAFE!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible! My baby almost fell if I didn’t catch him!!! NOT SAFE! And I cannot even contact them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It fits the HENSVIK from Ikea
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier. The quality is great and it fits the Ikea changing table we bought. You have no idea how sad my wife was when we built the changing table and our changing pad didn't fit. She cried!! Anyways we found the solution by searching reviews and someone else said this fit and it does!!
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good product
customer_reviews.text: We bought this since we had to return the one we borrowed. I really like how thick it is which makes it comfy for our toddler. However, since it curves up all around to prevent the child from falling on all sides it ends up being a bit short for a toddler that is approx 16 month old. We will still occasionally use this for now but will definitely use this once our new addition comes and with that, I believe would be a five star product since it will be long enough for our baby. Overall pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: amyT

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I set it up on a large table with all the accessories for changing. Very functional, easy to clean and convenient
customer_reviews.author: Radford

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size & shape
customer_reviews.text: Our baby's changing table could only accommodate a 30" long changing pad, so I was glad to find this one. Before ordering, I wasn't sure if I'd like that it was contoured on all 4 sides instead of just the long sides, but I do like it this way. In fact, the contour seems deeper than most changing pads which makes it a little bit safer in my opinion - my daughter is very wiggly! It's very easy to clean when my daughter isn't quite "done" when I think she is and there's no diaper under her.
customer_reviews.author: cb_colo

customer_reviews.title: Fits ikea changing table perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: It fits my ikea changing table perfectly and is very snug when strapped. I used summer infant changing pad covers that also fit perfectly so it matches my nursery. It is also very light.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: Fits well on my changing table and has a nice firmness to it. I do not use the straps but it is a nice addition if you need them.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

product_meta.title: LA Baby Waterproof 4 Sided Cocoon Style Changing Pad, 30" - Easy to Clean Quilted Cover W Non-Skid Bottom, Safety Strap, Fits All Standard Changing Tables/Dresser Tops for Best Infant Diaper Change
product_meta.description:
LA Baby 30" 4 sided Cocoon style changing pad has 4" high sides to keep baby safe and has an overall size of 30" x 16" x 4". Features a non-skid bottom that prevents pad from sliding while changing baby. Quilted outer cover is waterproof, anti-microbial, phthalate free, non-toxic, non-allergenic, stain resistant and easy to keep clean with mild soap and water Safety harness for baby with a quick release buckle. Includes security strap for holding changing pad to changing table or dresser top. Proudly made in the U.S.A from domestic and imported sources. 1 year warranty.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
